ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w man
ygData.msgSnippet: man that sucks big time, then you can never get the sash... ... From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@186k.net] Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 10:58 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
man that sucks big time, then you can never get the sash...

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 10:58 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our
fello w man


From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

The notes are NO DROP which means you cant give them to anyone or anything
sorry

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 38th
Da'Kor Guild of E Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Lombard.Mikhael <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 10:04 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w
man


> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> Question I am 19th and I really want to start doing the monk sash quests,
> but I am a Qeynos monk, can I make a free port monk and give the scroll to
a
> monster and then kill the monster with my Qeynos monk to get the scroll? I
> hope so, since there is no other way to get Faction with the Ashen Order.
> Plus where is a good place for a monk of 19th season to get that all
> important 20th season as a solo and with a group? I was thinking High
Hold,
> but I don't know.
>
> Kaladiel Ironfist
> 19th Season Monk
> Brell Serilius
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Hueseman [mailto:shueseman@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 10:00 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our
> fellow man
>
>
> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> >
> >From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
> >
> >It would be my hope that no monk
> >among us would go so far as to take the life of a fellow human in >order
to
>
> >gain
> >some modicum of advancement. >In Quellious' name,
> >
> >Manjushri
> >Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
> >
>
> Interesting idea, brother Manjushri. To advance to the highest levels of
> accomplishment, without taking the life of a human or demihuman (elf,
dwarf,
>
> halfling, gnome). Alas, I've already slain a fair number of pirates and
> bandits, but I wonder if I can abstain from doing so for the remainder of
my
>
> days? Truly a test worthy of a monk.
>
> Dornn, Level 17 Monk (Feign Death! Yeah, baby!), Brell Serilis, currently
> hunting Gargoyles in the Ocean of Tears.
>
